title: GRGlInterface.CreateNativeGlInterface() crashing on Mac
body:
### Description

I make a call to 
`var glInterface = GRGlInterface.CreateNativeGlInterface();`

my application just terminates, no exception or diagnostics are printed to console.

### Basic Information

- Version with issue:  1.60.3
- Last known good version:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that still working -->
- IDE:  VS for Mac, vscode
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing -->
  - macOS:  10.13.6
- Target Devices:
- Mac book pro 2017

This is a netcoreapp2.0 application.

Will upload a minimal repro shortly.

> VS bug [#735690](https://devdiv.visualstudio.com/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/735690)
